ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Ghoul Assassin Advice?
ygData.msgSnippet: 1.	Ok, there are 2 ways.  First: get invis to undead.  Take left side tunnel to vampire bat room.  Then take tunnel on left but inside that tunnel *hug the
ygData.messageBody:
1. Ok, there are 2 ways. First: get invis to undead. Take left side
tunnel to vampire bat room. Then take tunnel on left but inside that tunnel
*hug the right wall* (greater ice bone skels will agro on you if you don't -
they see thru all invis). Past the GIBS, you get to the bridge to the
tower. Cross and go towards rear. Look for the 2nd ladder you see (off to
the one side iirc). The assasin/Supplier room is up that 2nd ladder.
Second way if the BR is camped hard and all the deadly black widows are
dead, take the right tunnel and from the vampire bat room go right thru the
bugs - longer way but no GIBS (only bugs heh). It eventually pops out on
the side of the bridge to the tower.

2. Prolly 35 to 45. The named's are tough. Mean back stabs - keep your
back to the wall at all times.

3. Go at popular times to get the feel for the area and have lower
risk. Then go back at slower times to try to get a group. I think the mask
is regarded as a class specific novelty these days - since its bard rogue
only. You may be able to get loot rights just by asking and waiting. Oh
yeah waiting. Welcome to EverCamp. 2 hour spawn time iirc?

Heh, I have not been to Guk in a month or more. Guess I need to go back.

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Bardette of 48 songs
somewhere on Innoruuk
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly <http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly>


-----Original Message-----
From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 9:57 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Ghoul Assassin Advice?


So here are my humble questions:

1) I can get to the bedroom (who can't) but I don't know the exact way to
the assassin's room. How do I get to the room? I have several maps, but they
are all a bit sketchy in the assasin area, and I've heard there are ladders
involved.

2) Does anyone know what level group usually camps the room, or what the
common loot practices are? (eg. if I go for the mask, will I be excluded
from the other loot since I can use the mask, or is it not even counted
since it's no drop) It's not that I care, I'll go either way, I'm just
curious.

3) Is there anything in particular I need to watch out for?

Thanks,
Draelon Stormsong
the Tribunal
